title: What is U-Report?
content:
U-Report is a free large scale messaging tool designed to give young people and communities a chance to voice their opinions on issues that they care about, report on what is happening in their community and to receive messages with valuable, sometimes life-saving, information. Young people engage weekly on different issues that affect them answering questions through their phones. Results are visualized in a public website and then UNICEF and partners use it to achieve change.
